constraint: A qualifier MAY constrain a constraint in this specdoc.

qualifiers.constraint: A qualifier MAY NOT qualify any constraint except the one within the qualifier's immediate scope.

constraint: The build of every spec that inherits this spec MUST aggregate all of this spec's structural property:values and all this spec's inherited structural property:values recursively.
A doc which conforms to this spec MAY NOT violate any constraint in this spec's build.
Every included specdoc is itself a doc which MUST conform to the specs in all spec properties referenced in all this spec's specdocs and all inherited spec values recursively.
Every date must use the format DD/MM/YYYY.
